items.text: good length on middle stump, turned off the hips to square leg off the back foot
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Here's the list of most runs in a single ODI venue. Tamim now leads the pack.
items.text: good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot firmly past the non-striker to long on
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, worked off his pads to deep square leg. There's the team hundred
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, worked off his hips to the man at midwicket
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, uses his wrists to play this towards cow corner
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, tapped past the non-striker but Waller does well to race to his left and stop the ball from going through
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full outside off, forces the batsman to tentatively step forward, tries to defend but flies past the outside edge
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, spinning further away, Tamim cuts late but it's an excellent diving stop at short third man
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, punched off the back foot to mid off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, cut off the back foot but once again, it's straight to short third man
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pitched up full on middle stump, worked to wide mid on for a walking single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot and beats point. Races away to the backward point boundary, and that's Shakib's fifty!
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, driven to mid off off the front foot
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, angling into the batsman, tapped to cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, worked off his pads with soft hands to mid off
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle stump, forces the batsman to bring his bat down in a hurry. Fended back to Waller
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, turns away after pitching, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Hasan Tareq: "What should be the winning total here? Any thoughts." -- Anything over 260 would be challenging.
items.text: back of a length outside off, punched straight down the ground but intercepted by the bowler
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up full outside off, and entices Shakib to come down the ground. Attempts to lift this over the bowler's head but deceived by the spin! Turns away from his bat, and the keeper stumps him with ease. Raza with the breakthrough
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan st †Taylor b Sikandar Raza 51 (80b 6x4 0x6) SR: 63.75

items.preText: comes over the wicket for the right hander
items.text: full on off stump, turns into him, worked off his pads to short midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside off, nudged off his pads towards square leg for a quick run
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, pushed away from his body, and it's in the air! But flies just past Raza's right, and through to long off. There's Tamim's fifty as well!
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, worked off his legs to square leg once more
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, driven off the front foot to long off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, stays deep in his crease and punches towards deep midwicket. Played so softly that the outfielders race in to keep it down to only a single
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
